title: @Riot KateyKhaos, Inspiration for Gentleman Gnar?
body:
I was wondering what exactly the inspiration for Gentleman Gnar was. Where did the idea come from, why did you pick it over other ideas.

I make the "A Corporate Matter" stories, that are in the comments of the free rotation posts. In it, i have a character named Corporate Gnar, so i was wondering if my story had anything to do with the skin. It would be pretty cool if something i did influenced the game i love.

Also, was there any consideration about making it a legendary skin, or was it always planned to be a 975 range skin.

replies.body:
Hey King Dellron,

This was actually one of the early ideas for a Gnar skin before he was even released, buuuut Gnar in a dino onesie won as his launch skin (for obvious reasons. :3) The idea seemed like a natural choice for Gnar, since Mini Gnar and Mega Gnar were similar to the idea of Jekyll and Hyde. 

The skin itself was always planned to be a mid scope skin, and we didn't intend to give him a new set of VO. (Although, looking back, I'm curious what kind of words we could have made up...)

Thanks for the response.
Its a really awesome skin, been waiting for it since it was on the pbe, good work.

Also hoping for more Gentleman/Fair Lady(Gentlewomen?) skins in the future. I think most of the void champions would look good with one. Legendary is always best, because we need more British accents in league.
Can we make Lady Rek'Sai to go with gentleman Cho'Gath?

It's obvious!
They could be pronounced in a more cultured way.
